recipe.name: Mexican Skirt Steak and Avocado Salad
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb. green beans, trimmed 12 sprigs fresh thyme, divided 2 tbsp. olive oil, divided Kosher salt and pepper 1/2 c. grated Parmesan, divided
recipe.steps: Heat oven to 425°F. On a rimmed baking sheet, toss green beans and 6 sprigs thyme with 1 Tbsp oil and 1/4 tsp each salt and pepper, then toss with 1/4 cup Parmesan. Nestle artichokes onto pan, cut sides down, and roast on bottom rack in oven until golden brown and tender, 10 to 12 minutes.

recipe.name: Green Olive Shrimp Pasta
recipe.ingredients: 1 tbsp. grated lemon zest plus ¼ cup juice 1 scallion, finely chopped 1 c. flat-leaf parsley 3/4 c. pitted green olives Kosher salt
recipe.steps: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. In a small skillet, toast panko on medium, tossing often, until golden brown, about 6 minutes. Remove from heat and toss with lemon zest and scallion.

recipe.name: Sandy’s Chocolate Cake
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup butter, softened 3 cups packed brown sugar 4 large eggs, room temperature 2 teaspoons vanilla extract 2-2/3 cups all-purpose flour 3/4 cup baking cocoa 3 teaspoons baking soda 1/2 teaspoon salt 1-1/3 cups sour cream
recipe.steps: Preheat oven to 350°. Grease and flour three 9-in. round baking pans. In a large bowl, cream butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition. Beat in vanilla. In another bowl, whisk flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt; add to creamed mixture alternately with sour cream, beating well after each addition. Stir in water until blended.
